name: Tigabytes Latam
description:
Tigabytes was founded in 2006 in Santiago, Chile, as a Web services company. A startup with just 3 initial employees, Tigabytes became the first Google Enterprise Partner in Latin America 2007, selling GSA's and Mini's. By 2009, the success of selling Google Apps and other Google products, leads to the decision to drop all other lines of business to focus only on Google - hence the slogan "We just do Google".
Today, Tigabytes serves clients in over a dozen countries all over the region and has offices in Peru, Chile and Argentina. Tigabytes boasts over 500 clients and has migrated over 300,000 users, which makes it one of the leading Partners in the region in terms of expertise and depth of knowledge.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Av. El Pinar 180, Of. 404, Chacarilla del Estanque, Surco
